description: A response containing traffic flows between objects

___time_range.description: Time range of the document records

___start.description: ISO8601 timestamp of earliest record in document

___end.description: ISO8601 timestamp of latest record in document

___recordCount.description: Total record count (number of array items in data)

items.description: The schema of an array entry

___bytes.description: The volume of data that flows from source to destination

___packets.description: The number of packets sent from source to destination
